dc_title_s: British Columbia Kamloops sheet, geologically coloured; compiled and drawn by James McEvoy B.A.Sc.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by contours. At head of map "Geological Survey of Canada, George M. Dawson, C.M.G., L.L.D., F.R.S. & c. Director." "Sheet No. 12." "556" Includes "Explanatory Notes." On verso "556 British Columbia, sheet No. 12 (Kamloops sheet) Geology." 1 map: col.; 53 x 54 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: McEvoy, James.,Dawson, George Mercer, 1849-1901.,Geological Survey of Canada.
